overview_of_class: Introduction to extra-semantic meaning, focusing on the role of context in utterance production and interpretation. Topics include the semantics-pragmatics boundary, implicature, reference, presupposition, speech acts, and information structure. Students will be expected to read and discuss several articles and text chapters each week, and will be evaluated on a combination of class participation, a midterm exam, and either a final exam or a research paper
name: Pragmatics
subject: LING
